text: The Economic Freedom Fighters is a South African far left political party. It was formed in 2013 and has representatives at both local and national governments.| Ralph Mathekga: How to win friends and influence people, the EFF way | News24| Julius Malema launches party political platform | News | National | M&G; Julius Malema of South Africa's Economic Freedom Fighters - a profile - BBC News ==References== Category:Political parties in South Africa Category:2010s establishments in South Africa Category:2013 establishments in Africa
title: Economic Freedom Fighters
